segments.text: The water cascading down the cabinets creates a weirdly beautiful mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But there’s something unsettling about this beauty in chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost hear the impending crash of the boy if he loses his balance.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s a recipe for disaster, yet I can’t look away.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the woman will ever notice the water pooling around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her focus on that plate feels almost tragic in light of the chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can feel a knot forming in my stomach as I observe this unfolding scene.
segments.speaker: PAR
